mapper.select: select from_unixtime(tui.create_time / 1000, '%Y-%m-%d') date, count(*) as totalCount from electricity.t_user_info as tui left join electricity.t_user as tu on tui.uid=tu.uid where tui.del_flag=0 and tui.create_time >= #{startTimeMilliDay} and tui.create_time <=#{endTimeMilliDay} group by date order by date desc

select from_unixtime(tui.create_time / 1000, '%Y-%m-%d') date, count(*) as authCount from electricity.t_user_info as tui left join electricity.t_user as tu on tui.uid=tu.uid where tui.del_flag=0 and tui.service_status in(1,2,3) and tui.create_time >= #{startTimeMilliDay} and tui.create_time <=#{endTimeMilliDay} group by date order by date desc
